name: Rory Macmillan

notable: Founder, Macmillan & Co. which became Macmillan Keck Accredited mediator of the UK’s Centre for Effective Dispute Resolution (CEDR) Nominated for the CEDR Award for Excellence for contribution to dispute resolution in electronic communications sector Member Chartered Institute of Arbitrators

name: Richard Keck
notable: Co-Founder of Macmillan Keck Experience with legal systems in over 85 countries Built an electric guitar and color television in junior high school Raised cows and goats in senior high school Always ready for the next adventure

notable: Publications on regulation of digital financial services in Africa Experience drafting laws and regulations governing data protection, cybersecurity and competition Volunteer firefighter
